title: HOUR 3- Sam Amick Sep 03, 2020
itunes:title: HOUR 3- Sam Amick Sep 03, 2020
description:
Sam Amick says he did not see Steve Nash going to the Nets as the New Head Coach. Sam says he gives this move a big thumbs up. Sam tells Dan that Steve had a good connection with Kevin Durant in Golden St.

Sam Amick says he did not see Steve Nash going to the Nets as the New Head Coach. Sam says he gives this move a big thumbs up. Sam tells Dan that Steve had a good connection with Kevin Durant in Golden St.
